scripts.start: concurrently "npm run start:ui" "npm run start:api1" "npm run start:api2" "npm run start:api3"
scripts.start:ui: cd app-ui && npm install && npm start
scripts.start:api1: cd api/task && npm install && npm run start:dev
scripts.start:api2: cd api/task-management && npm install && npm run start:dev
scripts.start:api3: cd api/user && npm install && npm run start:dev
